text:
I tried to build Ant with the new JDK 1.4.2 and had a compile error while 
building the javah task.  It appears the interface to javah has changed.  I 
believe the old interface is still available via the sub-package oldjavah (I 
modified the javah source to use this package and the build completed).
creator: chuck.fowler@hp.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18667 ***
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
